name: Silver Rush crier
descriptions: The Silver Rush crier is the crier for the Silver Rush in Freeside in Fallout: New Vegas.

The crier for the Silver Rush is a man who is one of only a handful of people who has a job in Freeside and one of three criers in this area. He is employed by the Van Graffs, who pay him to boost public awareness of their establishment and help bring in customers. He is standing just below the Freeside sign in the second section of Freeside (the section which has the entrance to the Strip).

topics.response_text: You want to get your hands on some of the deadliest weapons around? Head just down the street to the Silver Rush. You won't be disappointed.

conversation.response_text: Come to the Silver Rush for all your energy weapon needs!
